title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that is contained within a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The system should allow for the successful export of data from tables within grid cells without throwing any exceptions.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a grid. 2. Perform the necessary steps to create a table inside one of the grid cells. 3. Attempt to export the data from the table within the grid cell.
